Summary: GLOWING DISC SHAPE WITH A HALO
divs: Sighting DetailsMID JULY 1998,11;30 AT NIGHT.MY WIFE AND I ON PATIO IN BACK YARD IT CAME OUT OF THE EASTERN SKY.AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS A METEOR,AS IT GOT CLOSER,I COULD TELL IT WAS NO METEOR.IT STOPPED ABOUT A MILE OR SO AWAY IN THE EASTERN SKY.ASKED MY WIFE,LOOK AT THIS,SHE DIDN,T LOOK UP.I COULD TELL THE SHAPE OF IT,LIKE A DISC.THE BODY OF IT WAS GLOWING,RED,YELLOW,AND ORANGE.IT WASN,T REAL BRIGHT BUT IT HAD A HALO AROUND IT.ASKED MY WIFE AGAIN TO LOOK UP,SHE DIDN,T.THEN IT MOVED IN A SOUTHERLY DIRECTION FOR ABOUT A HALF A MILE AND STOPPED AGAIN.ASKED HER AGAIN,SHE DIDN,T LOOK UP.THEN ALL OF A SUDDEN,IT STARTED TO GO EASTERLY AGAIN AT A RAPID SPEED BACK INTO SPACE.THE HALOS WERE GETTING SMALLER AS IT LEFT.LIKE IT WAS A TUNNEL,AND YOU COULD SEE THE OBJECT GETTING SMALLER INSIDE THE HALOS.I REPORTED THIS EVENT TWO YEARS LATER TO THE USUFORIC,WHICH WAS IN EASTERN TENNESSEE.THE HEAD OF THE ORGANIZATION PUT THE REPORT IN A JOURNAL ON THE WEB ALL OVER THE WORLD.THIS EVENT STILL BOTHERS ME AFTER ALL THESE YEARS.AND THE USUFORIC HAS SHUT DOWN ABRUPTLY A COUPLE OF YEARS AFTER THIS REPORT.IT STILL BOTHERS ME,I WISH I NEVER SEEN IT.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
